name: installer
description: Installs required NPM packages for integration tests
author: Rohan Nagar

scripts.create-table: aws dynamodb create-table --table-name pilot-users-test --attribute-definitions AttributeName=email,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=email,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=2,WriteCapacityUnits=2 --endpoint-url http://localhost:4567
